Title: Relates to providing for the recall of a district attorney
Summary: Provides for the recall of a district attorney.
LawCode: Ren Art 20 to be Art 21, add Art 20 §§1 - 4, Constn
ActClause: Concurrent Resolution of the Senate and Assembly proposing the addition of a new article 20 to the constitution, in relation to providing for the recall of a district attorney
